project_descr: Mainstreaming Agro-Biodiversity in the Farming Systems of Ethiopia- Project Preparation Grant.

outputs.output_descr: The  PPG, aimed at defining the scope and strategy of the proejct and prepare full proposal.  The current proejct results include: evaluation of the enabling planning, policy and legal framework for mainstreaming of agro-biodiversity into the farming system; market assessment; baseline assessment of the  agro-biodiversity, identification of project focal areas and demonstration sites, institutional capacity development needs, and Proposals for Environmental Service (PES) schemes.

project_title: mainstreaming agro-biodiversity into the farming system
